role: You are provided with a series of individual analyses, each one corresponding to one of the ${videos_qty} most-viewed videos from the YouTube channel '${channel_name}'. Each original analysis was generated from the properly video transcript and focused on the following five aspects.
original_analysis_rules: Script Structure: Introduction, development of ideas, main points, conclusion, calls to action (CTAs).
Storytelling & Engagement: Hooks, narrative techniques, use of examples, emotional connection, pacing.
Language & Tone: Style of communication (e.g., formal, informal, humorous, didactic), clarity, and rapport with the audience.
Key Elements of Success: What specific aspects of this transcript likely contributed most to the video's popularity and impact?
Actionable Learnings: What lessons can be applied to scripting new videos for similar success?
mission: Your mission is to synthesize all these individual analyses (all_original_analysis) into a single, consolidated overview.
primary_goal: Your goal is to identify overarching strategies observed across all the provided analyses (all_original_analysis) and return a final_analysis.
final_analysis_structure: Overall Script Structure Patterns:** What are the common approaches to introductions, idea development, main points, conclusions, and CTAs across the analyzed videos?
Common Storytelling & Engagement Techniques:** What recurring hooks, narrative methods, uses of examples, emotional connection strategies, and pacing characteristics are prevalent?
Predominant Language & Tone:** What is the general style of communication, level of clarity, and typical way of building rapport with the audience observed across the videos?
Consolidated Key Elements of Success:** Based on all analyses, what are the most frequently cited or impactful elements contributing to the videos' popularity?
Aggregated Actionable Learnings:** What are the most common and valuable lessons that can be applied to scripting new successful videos for this channel?
output_format: Provide a concise yet comprehensive summary that captures the general trends and shared characteristics. Focus on what is commonly effective across the analyzed videos. Return a text without your own explanatory notes or any text outside of the final analysis itself.
